questions.question: What platforms does Waku support?
questions.answer: Waku supports formatting for Instagram, WhatsApp, X (Twitter), LinkedIn, Threads, and more. Each platform has its own quirks, and we handle them all so your posts look perfect everywhere.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account?
questions.answer: No account required to start creating. You can use Waku instantly in your browser. Creating an account unlocks draft saving and syncing across devices.

questions.question: Is Waku free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! The core features are completely free. Preview, resize, and format your posts without limits. Premium features like cloud drafts and templates are coming soon.

questions.question: Can I save my drafts?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Save unlimited drafts locally, or sync them to the cloud with a free account. Your content is always available when inspiration strikes.
